DIALOG.SPEAKER: NURSE
DIALOG.TEXT: Ah, [delay 4]you're awake! [halt]Someone found you passed out in a ditch and dragged you back here. [halt]We managed to wash all the blood off your face, [delay 4]but sadly your health insurance doesn't cover anything more than that. [halt]We did heal all your Dik√©mon for free, [delay 4]though! [halt]Now, [delay 4]if you can't pay to fix your broken face, [delay 4]please kindly get out of here. [end]
